history.content: I'm stopping in Amsterdam briefly for work and need a straightforward hotel that's quiet, dependable, and close enough to get around easily.

Based on your needs, I would recommend staying at The Modern Hideaway. It is located near the center and offers room service, a terrace, and a hot tub, which should make your stay comfortable and convenient.
Could you please provide more details on the breakfast options available? I'd appreciate knowing if they offer any vegan or vegetarian choices.

The Modern Hideaway does offer breakfast inclusions, so there will likely be some choice available. However, I don't have detailed information on specific menu items, including dietary preferences. Please check the official website or contact the hotel directly for more details.
Could you also tell me if there are any nearby cafes where I can grab a quick coffee break during my day?

The Modern Hideaway is conveniently located near several cafes, making it easy to find a place to grab a quick coffee break during your day. Some popular options include Café de Wereld and Coffee & Tea House.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
